positions.title: Web Developer and Python Trainer
positions.description:
1. Organize and teach in a day-long React workshop for absolute beginners where participants learn about React fundamentals through building an e-commerce site
2. A daylong workshop that covers redux, redux-saga and advanced React concept through building a social media site
3. Workshops for moder javascript debugging, productivity and ES6 tips and tricks

positions.title: Sr. Web Developer
positions.description:
Summary:
‚Ä¢Leading front end development team, coordinating design, various application development and deployment
‚Ä¢Introduced and trained new tools, framework, development techniques for various teams
‚Ä¢Developed in house component, development guideline and wore different hat as needed to ship product on-time

Marketing Budget Explorer (MBE): Dec 2016 - current
‚Ä¢Architected and state of art angular4 application Marketing Budget Explorer (MBE)
‚Ä¢Designed and lead Front end development with latest tools and techniques including angular4, angular-cli, Google Material Design, SASS, Webpack, Typescript, etc.
‚Ä¢Maintained 80% and above code coverage through unit testing by using Jasmine, Karma, Istanbul, etc.
‚Ä¢ Implemented customized data visualization by using d3, ngx-charts, etc.
‚Ä¢Scaled application to support Internationalization and Translation to serve global clients

Bento (MTA): Oct 2016 -Nov 2016
‚Ä¢Developed a quick demoable and working prototype by using Angular2, angular-cli, angular material design etc.
‚Ä¢Succeeded to develop a production grade application with beta version of several libraries.

Multi-touch Attribution (MTA): March 2015 - Sept 2016
‚Ä¢Architected, designed and lead Front end development for Multi-Touch Attribution product
‚Ä¢Designed and developed customized path to purchase chart with interactive filter to display thousands of records
‚Ä¢Implemented Internationalization and Translation to serve global clients


Business Drivers version 3.0(BD3): Feb 2014 - March 2015
‚Ä¢Lead the full cycle development, project management, deployment, user training, client transition, etc.
‚Ä¢End to end development and launching of Mobile friendly Business Drivers and support modern browsers
‚Ä¢Developed custom chart, custom grid and custom component to facilitate visualization


‚Ä¶
see more

positions.title: Software Developer
positions.description:
Summary:
‚Ä¢ Managing teams and developing full life cycle project for responsive web application
‚Ä¢ Conducts training about new technologies, ideas and ways to improve current practices, etc.
‚Ä¢ Introduced new technology like Angular, Bootstrap, D3.js, etc. by evaluating several alternatives

Projects
‚Ä¢ Worked in a team to renovate a seven years old application to a responsive device compatible
‚Ä¢ Lead team for full stack development of ‚ÄúModel Result Visualization‚Äù for user friendly display of critical Marketing Mix Model with the ability to compare and drilldown
‚Ä¢ Developed front end of internal project for execution and resource capitalization
‚Ä¢ Conducted application wide performance analysis and reduce page loading time of mostly visited pages by 30%
‚Ä¢ Developed full life cycle Administration Application including requirement analysis, design, architecture, prototype development and demonstration in agile development method
‚Ä¢ Developed Return on Investment (ROI) Analysis for visualization and comparison of media performance


Technology
‚Ä¢ Angular, Bootstrap, UI Bootstrap, D3, Handlebar, MVC
‚Ä¢ Knockout, JQuery, JQUery UI, Underscore, C#, ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC, MS SQL
‚Ä¢ TortoiseHg, Jenkins, JIRA, Visual Studio, Sublime Text
‚Ä¶
see more

educations.title: Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology

given.text:
Md is an extremely talented developer. He is a driven, teach classes on javascript and has shown many new front-end concepts to his colleagues through Lunch & Learn sessions. He is a hard worker and understands the difference between task oriented and goal oriented outcomes. He continuously stays on top of new techs trend around front end development (Angular->Angular 2...) and implements changes judiciously. He is a great team player with an outstanding attitude. He also has a healthy lifestyle which gives him extra energy. I would work with Md again in a heartbeat.
‚Ä¶
See more
Md is a hard working individual who always put in the extra effort to accomplish his tasks.

Md Khan has a very effective development process that allows him to understand and work on creating or editing existing code in a consistent and timely manner. He is very eager to learn new technologies and takes the time to diligently research solutions before implementing them.

Md. Khan is a very hard working and talented individual who thinks through all the aspects of an issue to deliver a robust solution and is a great addition to a team. It is a pleasure to be professionally associated to Khan. I highly recommend him to all others.
Khan is an excellent employee. He is dependable, professional, and he has a wide variety of technology skills and interests.
MD Khan is a detail oriented engineer. He successfully completed a project for BTD this past summer. He executed the project with creativity and drive! MD Khan is an asset for any team.

MD Kahn worked for us and provided timings in which we based our management operating system off of. It was very detailed work, and Mr. Khan took ownership in the process. He is very knowledgeable and provides not only questions, but possible answers to the problems he encounters. He is also very passionate about his work and will see it through to completion. He is a very hard worker and very dependable. I would very much recommend Md Kahn. I am positive he will make a solid impact in whatever industry he is hired into.
‚Ä¶
See more

received.text: It was a great experience and learning to work at BTD. I met some awesome leaders and dedicated persons which make me passionate to deal with challenges.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Assistant Professor at Texas State University
Senior Software Engineer at Amazon Music
